messages.subject: ok, another question
messages.msgSnippet: I asked a while ago if there are any Canadian unschoolers on this list (and got no reply, but that person joined up here anyway, lol) and now, for a different
messages.messageBody:
I asked a while ago if there are any Canadian unschoolers on this list (and
got no reply, but that person joined up here anyway, lol) and now, for a
different friend that I HOPE will join in too here, I am asking if there are any
unschoolers in Louisiana. She is struggling law-wise and I'm hoping she might
be able to connect with a person who has bee there. Thanks in advance!

Karen



**************Ideas to please picky eaters. Watch video on AOL Living.
